FAQ.question: Is e-stamp valid for Sale Deed and agreements?
FAQ.answer: Yes. E-stamp is legally valid for all registrations and affidavits in Karnataka.

FAQ.question: Is e-stamp safer than physical stamp paper?
FAQ.answer: Yes. It is secure, tamper-proof, and eliminates counterfeit risks.

FAQ.question: Can I download e-stamp instantly?
FAQ.answer: Yes. JaaGa enables instant online e-stamp generation and download.
